verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I beheld and heard the voice of many angels
Round about the throne and the beasts and the elders
And the number of them was ten thousands times ten thousand
Thousands of thousands shouting with a loud voice

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blessings and honor and glory and power
Be unto Him that sits upon the throne
And unto the Lamb forever and ever
Worthy is the Lamb that was slain.
